00042 u32 *gpu32OutputBuff;
00043 u32 gu32OutputIndex = 0;

00045 u32 *gpu32InputBuff;
00046 u32 gu32InputSize = 0;
00047 u32 gu32InputIndex = 0;

00049 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00050 static void _AES_Init(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, AES_InitTypeDef* AES_InitStruct);

00056 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00057  * @brief Deinitialize the AES peripheral registers to their default reset values.
00058  * @param  HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES from the AES peripherals.
00059  * @retval None
00060  ************************************************************************************************************/
00061 void AES_DeInit(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn)
00062 {
00063   RSTCU_PeripReset_TypeDef RSTCUReset = {{0}};
00064   
00065   if (HT_AESn == NULL) // Remove the compiler warning
00066   {
00067   }
00068 
00069   RSTCUReset.Bit.AES = 1;
00070   RSTCU_PeripReset(RSTCUReset, ENABLE);
00071 }
00072 
00073 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00074  * @brief Flush the FIFO.
00075  * @param  HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES from the AES peripherals.
00076  * @retval None
00077  ************************************************************************************************************/
00078 void AES_FIFOFlush(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn)
00079 {
00080   AES_Cmd(HT_AESn, DISABLE);
00081   HT_AESn->CR |= AES_FLUSH_ENABLE;
00082   AES_Cmd(HT_AESn, ENABLE);
00083 }
00084 
00085 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00086  * @brief Enable or Disable the specified AES.
00087  * @param HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES from the AES peripherals.
00088  * @param NewState: This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00089  * @retval None
00090  ************************************************************************************************************/
00091 void AES_Cmd(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, ControlStatus NewState)
00092 {
00093   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00094   Assert_Param(IS_AES(HT_AESn));
00095   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
00096 
00097   if (NewState != DISABLE)
00098   {
00099     HT_AESn->CR |= AES_ENABLE;
00100   }
00101   else
00102   {
00103     HT_AESn->CR &= ~AES_ENABLE;
00104   }
00105 }
00106 
00107 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00108  * @brief Start the AES key.
00109  * @param HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES from the AES peripherals.
00110  * @retval None
00111  ************************************************************************************************************/
00112 void AES_StartKey(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn)
00113 {
00114   HT_AESn->CR |= (1 << 4);
00115 }
00116 
00117 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00118  * @brief Initialize the AES peripheral according to the specified parameters in the AES_InitStruct.
00119  * @param HT_AESn: where AES is the selected AES peripheral.
00120  * @param AES_InitStruct: pointer to a AES_InitTypeDef structure.
00121  * @retval None
00122  ************************************************************************************************************/
00123 void _AES_Init(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, AES_InitTypeDef* AES_InitStruct)
00124 {
00125   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00126   Assert_Param(IS_AES(HT_AESn));
00127   Assert_Param(IS_AES_KEY_SIZE(AES_InitStruct->AES_KeySize));
00128   Assert_Param(IS_AES_DIR(AES_InitStruct->AES_Dir));
00129   Assert_Param(IS_AES_MODE(AES_InitStruct->AES_Mode));
00130   Assert_Param(IS_AES_SWAP(AES_InitStruct->AES_Swap));
00131 
00132   HT_AESn->CR = (HT_AESn->CR & 0xFFFFFE81) | AES_InitStruct->AES_KeySize |
00133                  AES_InitStruct->AES_Dir | AES_InitStruct->AES_Mode |
00134                  AES_InitStruct->AES_Swap;
00135 
00136   AES_Cmd(HT_AESn, ENABLE);
00137 }
00138 
00139 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00140  * @brief Initialize the AES peripheral on ECB mode according to the specified parameters in the AES_InitStruct.
00141  * @param HT_AESn: where AES is the selected AES peripheral.
00142  * @param AES_InitStruct: pointer to a AES_InitTypeDef structure.
00143  * @retval None
00144  ************************************************************************************************************/
00145 void AES_ECB_Init(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, AES_InitTypeDef* AES_InitStruct)
00146 {
00147   AES_InitStruct->AES_Mode = AES_MODE_ECB;
00148   _AES_Init(HT_AESn, AES_InitStruct);
00149 
00150   AES_IntConfig(HT_AESn, AES_IER_OFINTEN, ENABLE);
00151   NVIC_EnableIRQ(AES_IRQn);
00152 }
00153

00161 {
00162   AES_InitStruct->AES_Mode = AES_MODE_CBC;
00163   _AES_Init(HT_AESn, AES_InitStruct);
00164 
00165   AES_IntConfig(HT_AESn, AES_IER_OFINTEN, ENABLE);
00166   NVIC_EnableIRQ(AES_IRQn);
00167 }

00178   _AES_Init(HT_AESn, AES_InitStruct);

00181   NVIC_EnableIRQ(AES_IRQn);

00184 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00185  * @brief Check whether the specified AES status has been set.
00186  * @param HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES peripheral.
00187  * @param AES_SR_x: specify the flag to be check.
00188  *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00189  *     @arg AES_SR_IFEMPTY  : AES Input FIFO is Empty
00190  *     @arg AES_SR_IFNFULL  : AES Input FIFO is not Full
00191  *     @arg AES_SR_OFNEMPTY : AES Output FIFO is not Empty
00192  *     @arg AES_SR_OFFULL   : AES Output FIFO is Full
00193  *     @arg AES_SR_BUSY     : AES is busy when AES is in encrypt/decrypt action and key expansion
00194  * @retval SET or RESET
00195  ************************************************************************************************************/
00196 FlagStatus AES_GetStatus(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, u32 AES_SR_x)
00197 {
00198   Assert_Param(IS_AES(HT_AESn));
00199   Assert_Param(IS_AES_STATUS(AES_SR_x));
00200 
00201   if ((HT_AESn->SR & AES_SR_x) != (u32)RESET)
00202   {
00203     return (SET);
00204   }
00205   else
00206   {
00207     return (RESET);
00208   }
00209 }
00210 
00211 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00212  * @brief Enable or Disable the AES PDMA interface.
00213  * @param HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected HT_AESn peripheral.
00214  * @param AES_PDMA_xFDMAEN: specify the AES FIFO DMA to be enabled or disabled.
00215  *   This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
00216  *     @arg AES_PDMA_IFDMAEN : input FIFO PDMA
00217  *     @arg AES_PDMA_OFDMAEN : Output FIFO PDMA
00218  * @param  NewState: This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00219  * @retval None
00220  ************************************************************************************************************/
00221 void AES_PDMACmd(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, u32 AES_PDMA_xFDMAEN, ControlStatus NewState)
00222 {
00223   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00224   Assert_Param(IS_AES(HT_AESn));
00225   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
00226 
00227   if (NewState != DISABLE)
00228   {
00229     HT_AESn->PDMAR |= AES_PDMA_xFDMAEN;
00230   }
00231   else
00232   {
00233     HT_AESn->PDMAR &= ~AES_PDMA_xFDMAEN;
00234   }
00235 }
00236 
00237 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00238  * @brief Check whether the specified AES interrupt has occurred.
00239  * @param HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES from the AES peripherals.
00240  * @param AES_INTSR_x: Specify the interrupt status to check.
00241  *   This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
00242  *     @arg AES_INTSR_IFINT :
00243  *     @arg AES_INTSR_OFINT :
00244  * @return SET or RESET
00245  ************************************************************************************************************/
00246 FlagStatus AES_GetIntStatus(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, u32 AES_INTSR_x)
00247 {
00248   FlagStatus Status;
00249   u32 aes_isr = HT_AESn->ISR;
00250   u32 aes_ier = HT_AESn->IER;
00251 
00252   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00253   Assert_Param(IS_AES(HT_AESn));
00254   Assert_Param(IS_AES_INTSR(AES_INTSR_x));
00255 
00256   Status = (FlagStatus)(aes_isr & aes_ier);
00257   if ((Status & AES_INTSR_x) != RESET)
00258   {
00259     Status = SET;
00260   }
00261   else
00262   {
00263     Status = RESET;
00264   }
00265 
00266   return Status;
00267 }
00268 
00269 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00270  * @brief Enable or Disable the specified AES interrupts.
00271  * @param HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES from the AES peripherals.
00272  * @param AES_IER_x: Specify the AES interrupt sources that is to be enabled or disabled.
00273  *   This parameter can be any combination of the following values:
00274  *     @arg AES_IER_IFINTEN :
00275  *     @arg AES_IER_OFINTEN :
00276  * @param NewState: This parameter can be ENABLE or DISABLE.
00277  * @retval None
00278  ************************************************************************************************************/
00279 void AES_IntConfig(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, u32 AES_IER_x, ControlStatus NewState)
00280 {
00281   /* Check the parameters                                                                                   */
00282   Assert_Param(IS_AES(HT_AESn));
00283   Assert_Param(IS_AES_IER(AES_IER_x));
00284   Assert_Param(IS_CONTROL_STATUS(NewState));
00285 
00286   if (NewState != DISABLE)
00287   {
00288     HT_AESn->IER |= AES_IER_x;
00289   }
00290   else
00291   {
00292     HT_AESn->IER &= ~AES_IER_x;
00293   }
00294 }
00295 
00296 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00297  * @brief Set the specified AES Input data.
00298  * @param HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES from the AES peripherals
00299  * @param AES_Data: Data input
00300  * @retval None
00301  ************************************************************************************************************/
00302 void AES_SetInputData(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, uc32 AES_Data)
00303 {
00304   Assert_Param(IS_AES(HT_AESn));
00305   #if (LIBCFG_AES_SWAP)
00306   HT_AESn->DINR = __REV(AES_Data);
00307   #else
00308   HT_AESn->DINR = AES_Data;
00309   #endif
00310 }
00311 
00312 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00313  * @brief Get the specified AES output data.
00314  * @param HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES from the AES peripherals
00315  * @retval Output Data
00316  ************************************************************************************************************/
00317 u32 AES_GetOutputData(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn)
00318 {
00319   Assert_Param(IS_AES(HT_AESn));
00320   #if (LIBCFG_AES_SWAP)
00321   return __REV(HT_AESn->DOUTR);
00322   #else
00323   return HT_AESn->DOUTR;
00324   #endif
00325 }
00326 
00327 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00328  * @brief Set the specified AES key table.
00329  * @param HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES from the AES peripherals.
00330  * @param Key: Key table
00331  * @param keySize: Key table's size
00332  * @retval None
00333  ************************************************************************************************************/
00334 void AES_SetKeyTable(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, u32 *Key, u32 keySize)
00335 {
00336   u32 i;
00337   u32 uCRTemp = HT_AESn->CR & (~(0x00000060UL));
00338   if (keySize == 128/8)
00339   {
00340     uCRTemp |= AES_KEYSIZE_128B;
00341   }
00342   #if (LIBCFG_AES_KEYSIZE_256B)
00343   else if (keySize == 192/8)
00344   {
00345     uCRTemp |= AES_KEYSIZE_192B;
00346   }
00347   else if (keySize == 256/8)
00348   {
00349     uCRTemp |= AES_KEYSIZE_256B;
00350   }
00351   #endif
00352   else
00353   {
00354     return;
00355   }
00356   HT_AESn->CR = uCRTemp;
00357 
00358   for (i = 0; i < keySize; i += 4)
00359   {
00360     #if (LIBCFG_AES_SWAP)
00361     HT_AESn->KEYR[i >> 2] = __REV(*&Key[i]);
00362     #else
00363     HT_AESn->KEYR[i >> 2] = *&Key[i];
00364     #endif
00365   }
00366 
00367   AES_StartKey(HT_AES);
00368 }
00369 
00370 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00371  * @brief Set the specified AES Vector table.
00372  * @param HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES from the AES peripherals.
00373  * @param Vector:
00374  * @retval None
00375  ************************************************************************************************************/
00376 void AES_SetVectorTable(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn, u32 *Vector)
00377 {
00378   int i;
00379   Assert_Param(IS_AES(HT_AESn));
00380 
00381   for (i = 0; i < 16; i += 4)
00382   {
00383     #if (LIBCFG_AES_SWAP)
00384     HT_AESn->IVR[i >> 2] = __REV(*&Vector[i]);
00385     #else
00386     HT_AESn->IVR[i >> 2] = *&Vector[i];
00387     #endif
00388   }
00389 }
00390 
00391 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00392  * @brief AES Crypt Data
00393  * @param HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES from the AES peripherals
00394  * @param dir: Crypt Data's direction
00395  * @param iv: initial vector table
00396  * @param length: data size
00397  * @param inputData: InputData
00398  * @param outputData: Output Data
00399  * @retval SUCCESS or ERROR
00400  ************************************************************************************************************/
00401 ErrStatus _AES_CryptData(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn,
00402                          AES_DIR_Enum dir,
00403                          u32 *iv,
00404                          u32 length,
00405                          u32 *inputData,
00406                          u32 *outputData)
00407 {
00408   /*AES Data blocks 16 byte                                                                                 */
00409   if ((length % 16) != 0)
00410   {
00411     /* Data size can not be divisible by 16.                                                                */
00412     return ERROR;
00413   }
00414 
00415   /*Set inital Vector                                                                                       */
00416   if (iv != NULL)
00417   {
00418     AES_SetVectorTable(HT_AESn, iv);
00419   }
00420 
00421   /*FIFO Flush                                                                                              */
00422   AES_FIFOFlush(HT_AES);
00423 
00424   /*Set direction                                                                                           */
00425   HT_AESn->CR = (HT_AESn->CR & 0xFFFFFFFD) | dir;
00426 
00427   /*Create input/output data                                                                                */
00428   gpu32InputBuff = inputData;
00429   gpu32OutputBuff = outputData;
00430 
00431   /*Init Index                                                                                              */
00432   gu32OutputIndex = 0;
00433   gu32InputSize  = length/4;
00434 
00435   /*Set input data                                                                                          */
00436   AES_IntConfig(HT_AES, AES_IER_IFINTEN, ENABLE);
00437 
00438   /*Waitting for conversion                                                                                 */
00439   while (AES_GetStatus(HT_AES, AES_SR_OFNEMPTY));
00440   return SUCCESS;
00441 }

00448  * @param length: data size

00451  * @retval SUCCESS or ERROR
00452  ************************************************************************************************************/
00453 ErrStatus AES_ECB_CryptData(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn,
00454                        AES_DIR_Enum dir,
00455                        u32 length,
00456                        u32 *inputData,
00457                        u32 *outputData)
00458 {
00459   return _AES_CryptData(HT_AESn,
00460                         dir,
00461                         NULL,
00462                         length,
00463                         inputData,
00464                         outputData);
00465 }

00492 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00493  * @brief AES Crypt Data on CTR mode
00494  * @param HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES from the AES peripherals
00495  * @param iv: initial vector table
00496  * @param length: data size
00497  * @param inputData: InputData
00498  * @param outputData: Output Data

00501 ErrStatus AES_CTR_CryptData(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn,
00502                        u32 *iv,
00503                        u32 length,

00505                        u32 *outputData)
00506 {

00510                         length,

00512                         outputData);
00513 }

00515 
00516 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00517  * @brief This function handles AES Core interrupt.
00518  * @param HT_AESn: where HT_AESn is the selected AES from the AES peripherals.
00519  * @retval None
00520  ************************************************************************************************************/
00521 void AESCore_IRQHandler(HT_AES_TypeDef* HT_AESn)
00522 {
00523   if (AES_GetIntStatus(HT_AES, AES_INTSR_OFINT))
00524   {
00525     gpu32OutputBuff[gu32OutputIndex++] = AES_GetOutputData(HT_AES);
00526   }
00527   if (AES_GetIntStatus(HT_AES, AES_INTSR_IFINT))
00528   {
00529     if (gu32InputIndex < gu32InputSize)
00530     {
00531       AES_SetInputData(HT_AES, gpu32InputBuff[gu32InputIndex]);
00532       gu32InputIndex++;
00533     }
00534     else
00535     {
00536       AES_IntConfig(HT_AES, AES_IER_IFINTEN, DISABLE);
00537       gu32InputIndex = 0;
00538     }
00539   }
00540 }
